importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);
u="&&";v="::";p="searchPage";
function get(www,css){
list=Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(www)).select(css).toArray().map(a=>a.text()+v+a.attr("href")+u).join("");
return list;}
result=get("https://xiaoshuogui.com/book/",".filter a:not([class]),.filter>ul>li:first-of-type>a:first-of-type");
result.replace(/&&([A-Z])::/g,"&&ç´¢å¼• / $1::").replace(/(?=å­—æ•°::)/,"æ€»").replace(/\d(\.html&&)/g,"searchPage$1")
</js>
